summary: A house on the coast of the lake north of Falkreath. Has three houses, a pet mammoth and lots of storage.
descriptionHtml:
[size=+4][center][font=CloisterBlack BT]Lakeside Player Home[/font][/center][/size]
[size=+3][font=Lithogragh Light]Features:[/font][/size]
[size=+1]•Three Separate Houses[/size]
[size=+1]•One Non-Moving Pet Mammoth[/size]
[size=+1]•A Beautiful Lakeside View[/size]
[size=+3][font=Lithogragh Light]Requirements:[/font][/size]
[size=+1]•None[/size]
[size=+3][font=Lithogragh Light]Suggested Mods:[/font][/size]
[size=+1][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]•Realistic Water 2[/url][/size]
[size=+1][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3288/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D3288&pUp=1]•Lush Trees and Grass[/url][/size]
[size=+3][font=Lithogragh Light]Compatibility:[/font][/size]
[size=+1]This mod should work with any mods that don't put something in the exact spot where these houses were placed. There isn't really anything changed, just added.[/size]
[size=+3][font=Lithogragh Light]Installation:[/font][/size]
[size=+1]For NMM just lick the button
For Manual click [i]download manually[/i] and carry the file in the .rar into your data files.[/size]
author: Nyait
